CHAT.comment: ARIZONA FREE ENTERPRISE CLUB'S FREEDOM CLUB PAC, ET AL., Petitioners v. KEN BENNETT, IN HIS OFFICIAL CAPACITY AS ARIZONA SECRETARY OF STATE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM R. MAURER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BRADLEY S. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM M. JAY, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM R. MAURER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
